title: Final Exam: C1 Banking & Finance Mastery

items.prompt: Which valuation method relies on the present value of future cash flows?
items.explanation: DCF calculates value based on projected future cash flows discounted to the present.

items.prompt: If the company ________ earlier, it wouldn't be facing insolvency today.
items.explanation: Third conditional (past hypothetical): If + past perfect, would + have + past participle (implied by 'wouldn't be facing').

items.prompt: Which term refers to the simultaneous purchase and sale of an asset in different markets to exploit price discrepancies?
items.explanation: Arbitrage is the practice of taking advantage of price differences in different markets.

items.prompt: Under no circumstances ________ the firm trade without a robust risk management framework.
items.explanation: Formal inversion with 'Under no circumstances' requires an auxiliary verb before the subject.

items.prompt: The fiduciary ________ of a fund manager is to act in the best interests of their investors.
items.explanation: 'Fiduciary duty' is the standard legal term for this obligation.
